languages.text: "Береги свою смертную шкурку, {name}. Я слышала, от тебя ждут великих свершений — будет обидно, если ты умрешь раньше".

traits.locale_text: "Береги свою смертную шкурку, {name}. Я слышала, от тебя ждут великих свершений — будет обидно, если ты умрешь раньше".

languages.text: "Take care of your mortal hide, {name}. I heard that great things are expected of you, it would be a shame if you died too soon."
languages.original_text: "Береги свою смертную шкурку, {name}. Я слышала, от тебя ждут великих свершений — будет обидно, если ты умрешь раньше".

traits.locale_text: "Take care of your mortal hide, {name}. I heard you are expected for great things, it would be a shame if you died early."
"Take care of your mortal hide, {name}. I heard you are expected for great things, it would be a shame if you died early."
"Take care of your mortal hide, {name}. I heard that great things are expected of you, it would be a shame if you died too soon."
"Take care of your mortal hide, {name}. I heard that great things are expected of you, it would be a shame if you died too soon."
"Take care of your mortal hide, {name}. I heard that great things are expected of you, it would be a shame if you died too soon."

languages.text: “当心你那凡人的皮囊，{name}。我听说所有人都对期望很高，如果你死得太早，那恐怕就太可惜了。”
languages.original_text: "Take care of your mortal hide, {name}. I heard that great things are expected of you, it would be a shame if you died too soon."

traits.locale_text: “当心你那凡人的皮囊，{name}。我听说所有人都对期望很高，如果你死得太早，那恐怕就太可惜了。”

languages.text: «Cuida bien de tu cuerpo mortal, {name}. He oído que se esperan grandes cosas de ti. Sería una tragedia que murieras tan pronto».
languages.original_text: "Take care of your mortal hide, {name}. I heard that great things are expected of you, it would be a shame if you died too soon."

traits.locale_text: «Cuida bien de tu cuerpo mortal, {name}. He oído que se esperan grandes cosas de ti. Sería una tragedia que murieras tan pronto».

languages.text: 「死の影には気を付けるんだな、{name}。あんたにはたくさんの期待が寄せられている。でも、早く死んでしまえば元も子もないだろ」
languages.original_text: "Take care of your mortal hide, {name}. I heard that great things are expected of you, it would be a shame if you died too soon."

traits.locale_text: 「死の影には気を付けるんだな、{name}。あんたにはたくさんの期待が寄せられている。でも、早く死んでしまえば元も子もないだろ」

languages.text: "Gebt auf Eure sterbliche Haut Acht, {name}. Ich habe gehört, dass man von Euch Großes erwartet. Es wäre doch ein Jammer, wenn Ihr zu früh sterbt."
languages.original_text: "Take care of your mortal hide, {name}. I heard that great things are expected of you, it would be a shame if you died too soon."

traits.locale_text: "Gebt auf Eure sterbliche Haut Acht, {name}. Ich habe gehört, dass man von Euch Großes erwartet. Es wäre doch ein Jammer, wenn Ihr zu früh sterbt."

languages.text: « Prenez soin de votre carcasse mortelle, {name}. On fonde de grands espoirs sur vous, et il serait regrettable que vous mouriez prématurément. »
languages.original_text: "Take care of your mortal hide, {name}. I heard that great things are expected of you, it would be a shame if you died too soon."

traits.locale_text: « Prenez soin de votre carcasse mortelle, {name}. On fonde de grands espoirs sur vous, et il serait regrettable que vous mouriez prématurément. »

languages.text: "Ölümlü postuna iyi bak {name}. Sana dair büyük beklentiler olduğunu duydum. Erkenden ölürsen çok yazık olurdu."
languages.original_text: "Take care of your mortal hide, {name}. I heard that great things are expected of you, it would be a shame if you died too soon."
